mapper.insert: INSERT INTO databoard(subject, content, userid, filename1, filename2) VALUES(#{subject}, #{content}, #{userid}, #{filename1}, #{filename2})
mapper.select: select no, subject, userid, date_format(writedate, '%m-%d %H:%i') writedate, filename1, filename2 from databoard order by no desc
